original_title: La vie sexuelle des Belges partie 3 - Fermeture de l'usine Renault à Vilvoorde
overview: The Renault factory in Belgium must close down. Nobody can believe it. We follow the investigations by the director who is at the heart of the action and who interviews main politicians, the workers who violently protest and the direction. In the fiction part the president-director of Renault, Schweitzer is killed by one of the workers.
title: La vie sexuelle des Belges partie 3 - Fermeture de l'usine Renault à Vilvoorde
